TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BaseDataList extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl
Public MustInherit Class BaseDataList Inherits WebControl
public ref class BaseDataList abstract : System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebControl

summary.span: 用作数据列表控件的抽象基类，如 和 。

span.span: Serves as the abstract base class for data listing controls, such as and .

summary.span: 此类提供由所有数据列表控件公用的方法和属性。

span.span: This class provides the methods and properties common to all data listing controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供的常见功能的所有数据列表控件，如和。The class provides the common functionality for all data listing controls, such as and . 数据列表控件用于显示来自数据源的记录，如控件。A data listing control is used to display the records from a data source, such as a control. 每个数据列表控件可以有唯一的显示样式和功能。Each data listing control can have a unique display style and capabilities. 因为类是抽象的不直接创建此类的实例。Because the class is abstract, an instance of this class is not created directly. 相反，数据列表控件继承的方法和属性普遍适用于所有数据列表从该类的控件。Instead, data listing controls inherit the methods and properties common to all data listing controls from this class. 您可以控制数据通过设置此类的某些属性列表控件的外观。You can control the appearance of a data listing control by setting certain properties of this class. 若要确定数据列表控件的单元格之间的间距大小，请设置属性。To determine the amount of spacing between the cells of a data listing control, set the property. 若要确定单元格的内容和单元格的边框之间的间距大小，请设置属性。To determine the amount of spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border, set the property. 您可以显示之间的数据列表控件，通过设置单个单元格的边框属性。You can display the border between the individual cells of a data listing control by setting the property. 中的数据列表控件单元格的内容的水平对齐方式由控制属性。The horizontal alignment of the content in the cells of a data listing control is controlled by the property. 类提供了两个属性，以支持数据绑定。The class provides two properties to support data binding. 若要将数据绑定到任何实现的集合接口 (如或)，或接口，请使用属性来指定数据源。To bind data to any collection that implements the interface (such as or ), or the interface, use the property to specify the data source. 当您将设置属性时，必须手动编写代码来执行数据绑定。When you set the property, you must manually write the code to perform the data binding. 若要自动将绑定数据列表控件与数据源表示数据源控件，请使用属性并将其值设置为要使用的数据源控件的属性。To automatically bind a data listing control to a data source represented by a data source control, use the property and set its value to the property of the data source control to use. 当您将设置属性，数据列表控件自动将绑定到指定的数据源控件。When you set the property, the data listing control automatically binds to the specified data source control. 因此，不需要显式调用方法。Therefore, you do not need to explicitly call the method. 如果通过指定数据源属性包含多个源的数据，请使用属性来指定要绑定到控件的特定源。If the data source specified by the property contains multiple sources of data, use the property to specify the specific source to bind to the control. 例如，如果你有对象具有多个表，必须指定要绑定到控件的表。For example, if you have a object with multiple tables, you must specify which table to bind to the control. 指定数据源后，使用方法将数据源绑定到控件。After you have specified the data source, use the method to bind the data source to the control. 类包含存储数据列表控件中的键字段 （显示为一行） 每个记录的集合。The class contains a collection that stores the key field of each record (displayed as a row) in a data listing control. 这可以用来存储数据列表控件而不会显示在控件中使用的键字段。This allows you to store the key field with a data listing control without displaying it in the control. 键字段通常作为更新查询字符串的一部分用于修改数据源中的特定记录。The key field is commonly used as part of an update query string to revise a specific record in the data source. 集合中指定的字段的值填充属性。The collection is filled with the values from the field specified by the property. 类提供了控件中选定的项更改时引发的事件。The class provides a event that is raised when the selected item in the control changes. 这允许你创建的自定义事件处理程序引发事件时执行一组特定的说明。This allows you to create a custom event handler that performs a specific set of instructions when the event is raised.

span.para: 继承自，必须重写以下成员：和。
When you inherit from , you must override the following members: and .

span.span: Notifies the server control that an element, either XML or HTML, was parsed, and adds the element to the server control's collection.

summary.span: 获取或设置要在控件中的 HTML 标题元素中呈现的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text to render in an HTML caption element in the control.

summary.span: 提供此属性的目的是使辅助技术设备的用户更易于访问控件。

span.span: This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices.

value.span: 一个字符串，表示要在控件中的 HTML 标题元素中呈现的文本。

span.span: A string that represents the text to render in an HTML caption element in the control.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定要在控件中的 HTML 标题元素中呈现的文本。Use the property to specify the text to render in an HTML caption element in the control. 您指定的文本提供了辅助技术设备控件的说明。The text that you specify provides assistive technology devices with a description of the control. 若要在控件中指定的 HTML 标题元素的对齐方式，使用属性。To specify the alignment of the HTML caption element in the control, use the property. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到资源文件使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

summary.span: 获取或设置控件中的 HTML 标题元素的水平或垂直位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the horizontal or vertical position of the HTML caption element in a control.

summary.span: 提供此属性的目的是使辅助技术设备的用户更易于访问控件。

span.span: This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices.

value.span: 枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性在控件中指定的 HTML 标题元素的水平或垂直位置。Use the property to specify the horizontal or vertical position of the HTML caption element in a control. 提供此属性的目的是使辅助技术设备的用户更易于访问控件。This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices. 此属性使用其中一个设置枚举值。This property is set using one of the enumeration values. 下表列出了可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |“值”Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`NotSet`|未设置该标题元素的对齐方式。The caption element's alignment is not set.| |`Top`|标题元素和表的顶部对齐。The caption element is aligned with the top of the table.| |`Bottom`|标题元素和表的底部对齐。The caption element is aligned with the bottom of the table.| |`Left`|标题元素的表的左边缘对齐。The caption element is aligned with the left edge of the table.| |`Right`|标题元素的表的右边缘对齐。The caption element is aligned with the right edge of the table.| 使用属性来指定要在控件中的 HTML 标题元素中呈现的文本。Use the property to specify the text to render in an HTML caption element in a control.

exception.span: 指定的类型不是 枚举值之一。

span.span: The specified type is not one of the enumeration values.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual int CellPadding { get; set; }
.property instance int32 CellPadding
Public Overridable Property CellPadding As Integer
public: virtual property int CellPadding { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.CellPadding : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置单元格的内容和单元格的边框之间的空间量。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.

value.span: 单元格的内容和单元格的边框之间的空间量（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The amount of space (in pixels) between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.

value.span: 默认值为 -1，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is -1, which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性控制的单元格内容和单元格的边框之间的间距。Use the property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border. 指定的填充量添加到单元格的所有四个边。The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of the cell. 数据列表控件的同一列中的所有单元格具有相同的单元格宽度。All cells in the same column of a data listing control share the same cell width. 因此，如果一个单元格内容的长度超过其他单元格内容的同一列中，填充量应用到最宽的单元格。Therefore, if the content of one cell is longer than the content of other cells in the same column, the padding amount is applied to the widest cell. 列中的所有其他单元格也都设置为此单元格的宽度。All other cells in the column are also set to this cell width. 同样，在同一行中的所有单元格都具有相同的高度。Similarly, all cells in the same row share the same height. 填充量应用于的行中最高的单元格的高度。The padding amount is applied to the height of the tallest cell in the row. 行中的所有其他单元格设置为此单元格的高度。All other cells in the row are set to this cell height. 不能指定单个单元格的大小。Individual cell sizes cannot be specified. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定的单元格内容和单元格的边框之间的间距。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border. [!code-aspx-csharp[BaseDataListCellPadding#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListCellPadding/CS/basedatalistcellpaddingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BaseDataListCellPadding#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListCellPadding/VB/basedatalistcellpaddingvb.aspx#1)]

public: virtual property int CellSpacing { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.CellSpacing : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置单元格间的空间量。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space between cells.

value.span: 单元格间的空间量（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The amount of space (in pixels) between cells.

value.span: 默认值为 0。

span.span: The default value is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来控制数据列表控件中相邻单元格之间的间距。Use the property to control the spacing between adjacent cells in a data listing control. 垂直方向和水平应用此间距。This spacing is applied both vertically and horizontally. 单元格间距是统一的整个数据列表控件。The cell spacing is uniform for the entire data listing control. 不能指定每个行或列之间的单个单元格间距。Individual cell spacing between each row or column cannot be specified. > [!NOTE] > 如果您设置此属性的值大于`0`并设置属性显示单元格的边框的值，间隔显示相邻单元格边框之间。If you set this property to a value greater than `0` and set the property to a value that displays the cell borders, a gap is displayed between the borders of adjacent cells. 在此情况下，属性控制的差异大小。In this situation, the property controls the size of the gap. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定相邻单元格之间的间距。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the spacing between adjacent cells. [!code-aspx-csharp[BaseDataListCellPadding#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListCellPadding/CS/basedatalistcellpaddingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BaseDataListCellPadding#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListCellPadding/VB/basedatalistcellpaddingvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取 对象，它包含数据列表控件中的子控件的集合。

span.span: Gets a object that contains a collection of child controls in a data listing control.

value.span: ，它包含数据列表控件中的子控件的集合。

span.span: A that contains a collection of child controls in a data listing control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用集合来管理包含数据列表控件中的子控件。Use the collection to manage the child controls contained in a data listing control. 可以将控件添加、 删除控件，或循环访问集合中的服务器控件。You can add controls, remove controls, or iterate through the server controls in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式添加到控件集合。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically add a control to the collection. [!code-aspx-csharp[BaseDataListControls#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListControls/CS/basedatalistcontrolscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BaseDataListControls#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListControls/VB/basedatalistcontrolsvb.aspx#1)]

.method public hidebysig virtual instance void DataBind() cil managed
Public Overrides Sub DataBind ()
public: override void DataBind();
override this.DataBind : unit -> unit

summary.span: 将控件及其所有子控件绑定到指定的数据源。

span.span: Binds the control and all its child controls to the specified data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法将指定的数据源绑定数据列表控件的属性。Use the method to bind the data source specified by the property to the data listing control. 通过将数据源绑定到数据列表控件，数据列表控件中显示数据源中的信息。By binding the data source to a data listing control, the information in the data source is displayed in a data listing control. 方法通常还用于同步的数据源和数据列表控件后更新数据源中的信息。The method is also commonly used to synchronize the data source and a data listing control after information in the data source is updated. 这允许要也更新数据列表控件中的数据源中的任何更改。This allows any changes in the data source to also be updated in a data listing control. 如果数据列表控件的数据源指定由属性，则不需要调用方法。If the data source for the data listing control is specified by the property, you do not need to call the method. ASP.NET 调用此方法会自动将指定的数据源控件绑定到数据列表控件。ASP.NET calls this method automatically to bind the specified data source control to the data listing control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法绑定到的数据源控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to bind a data source to a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGrid Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGrid Example 2/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGrid Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGrid Example 2/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置由 属性指定的数据源中的键字段。

span.span: Gets or sets the key field in the data source specified by the property.

value.span: 指定的数据源中的键字段的名称。

span.span: The name of the key field in the data source specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可以在数据源中指定的键字段由属性。Use the property to specify the key field in the data source indicated by the property. 指定的字段用于填充集合。The specified field is used to populate the collection. 这可以用来存储数据列表控件而不会显示在控件中使用的键字段。This allows you to store the key field with a data listing control without displaying it in the control. 键字段常用的处理程序中的事件，如`ItemCommand`或`DeleteCommand`，更新查询字符串来修改数据源中的特定记录的一部分。The key field is commonly used in a handler for an event, such as `ItemCommand` or `DeleteCommand`, as part of an update query string to revise a specific record in the data source. 键字段可帮助标识要修改的相应记录的更新查询字符串。The key field helps the update query string identify the appropriate record to modify. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定数据源的键字段。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the key field for the data source. [!code-aspx-csharp[BaseDataListDataKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListDataKeys/CS/basedatalistdatakeyscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BaseDataListDataKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListDataKeys/VB/basedatalistdatakeysvb.aspx#1)]

member this.DataKeys : System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyCollection

summary.span: 获取 对象，它存储数据列表控件中每个记录的键值。

span.span: Gets a object that stores the key values of each record in a data listing control.

value.span: ，它存储数据列表控件中每个记录的键值。

span.span: A that stores the key values of each record in a data listing control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用要访问在数据列表控件 （显示为一行） 每个记录的键值集合。Use the collection to access the key values of each record (displayed as a row) in a data listing control. 这可以用来存储数据列表控件而不会显示在控件中使用的键字段。This allows you to store the key field with a data listing control without displaying it in the control. 此集合中指定的字段的值自动填充属性。This collection is automatically filled with the values from the field specified by the property. 键字段常用的处理程序中的事件，如`ItemCommand`或`DeleteCommand`，更新查询字符串来修改数据源中的特定记录的一部分。The key field is commonly used in a handler for an event, such as `ItemCommand` or `DeleteCommand`, as part of an update query string to revise a specific record in the data source. 键字段可帮助标识要修改的相应记录的更新查询字符串。The key field helps the update query string identify the appropriate record to modify. 使用 ASP.NET 访问数据的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 数据访问内容映射](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2)。For more information on accessing data with ASP.NET, see [ASP.NET Data Access Content Map](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来确定要删除的记录的键字段的值。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the value of the key field for the record being deleted. [!code-aspx-csharp[BaseDataListDataKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListDataKeys/CS/basedatalistdatakeyscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BaseDataListDataKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListDataKeys/VB/basedatalistdatakeysvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置多成员数据源中要绑定到数据列表控件的特定数据成员。

span.span: Gets or sets the specific data member in a multimember data source to bind to a data listing control.

value.span: 多成员数据源中的数据成员。

span.span: A data member from a multimember data source.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定多成员数据源中要绑定到列表控件的成员。Use the property to specify a member from a multimember data source to bind to the list control. 例如，如果有多个表中指定的数据源属性，请使用属性来指定要绑定到数据列表控件的表。For example, if you have a data source with more than one table specified in the property, use the property to specify which table to bind to a data listing control. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定的表中要绑定到对象控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify which table in a object to bind to a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[BaseDataListDataMember#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListDataMember/CS/basedatalistdatamembercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BaseDataListDataMember#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListDataMember/VB/basedatalistdatamembervb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置源，该源包含用于填充控件中的项的值列表。

span.span: Gets or sets the source containing a list of values used to populate the items within the control.

value.span: 一个 或 ，包含用于为此控件提供数据的值集合。

span.span: An or that contains a collection of values used to supply data to this control.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定要绑定到数据列表控件的值的源。Use the property to specify the source of values to bind to a data listing control. 数据源必须实现的集合接口 (如， ，或) 或界面以绑定到控件派生自类。A data source must be a collection that implements either the interface (such as , , or ) or the interface to bind to a control derived from the class. 当您将设置属性时，必须手动编写代码来执行数据绑定。When you set the property, you must manually write the code to perform data binding. 如果通过指定数据源属性包含多个源的数据，请使用属性来指定要绑定到控件的特定源。If the data source specified by the property contains multiple sources of data, use the property to specify the specific source to bind to the control. 例如，如果你有对象具有多个表，必须指定要绑定到控件的表。For example, if you have a object with multiple tables, you must specify which table to bind to the control. 指定数据源后，使用方法将数据源绑定到控件。After you have specified the data source, use the method to bind the data source to the control. 或者，可以使用属性自动绑定到数据源控件所表示的数据源。Alternately, you can use the property to automatically bind to a data source represented by a data source control. 当您将设置属性，数据列表控件自动将绑定到指定的数据源控件。When you set the property, the data listing control automatically binds to the specified data source control. 不需要编写代码显式调用方法。You do not need to write code that explicitly calls the method. 如果两个指定值属性和属性，则 ASP.NET 将无法解析数据源和一个引发异常。If values are specified for both the property and the property, ASP.NET is not able to resolve the data source and an exception is thrown. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定要绑定到数据源控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the data source to bind to a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGrid Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGrid Example 2/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGrid Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGrid Example 2/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

The data source is of an invalid type.

summary.span: 获取或设置数据源控件的 属性，数据列表控件应使用它来检索其数据源。

span.span: Gets or sets the property of the data source control that the data listing control should use to retrieve its data source.

value.span: 分配给数据源控件的编程标识符。

span.span: The programmatic identifier assigned to the data source control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来访问数据列表控件应使用它来检索其数据源的数据源控件的属性。Use the property to access the property of the data source control that the data listing control should use to retrieve its data source. 数据源引用的控件属性可以是任何实现控件接口。The data source control referenced by the property can be any control that implements the interface. 数据源控件必须存在于数据列表控件的引用，相同的命名容器或父控件的数据列表控件中。The data source control must exist either in the same naming container as the data listing control that references it, or in a parent control of the data listing control. 当指定此属性的值时，数据列表控件自动将绑定到指定的数据源控件。When you specify a value for this property, the data listing control automatically binds to the specified data source control. 不需要编写代码显式调用方法。You do not need to write code that explicitly calls the method. 或者，可以使用属性来指定要绑定到数据列表控件的值的源。Alternately, you can use the property to specify the source of values to bind to a data listing control. 数据源必须实现的集合接口 (如， ，或) 或界面以绑定到控件派生自类。The data source must be a collection that implements the interface (such as , , or ) or the interface to bind to a control derived from the class. 当您将设置属性时，必须手动编写代码来执行数据绑定。When you set the property, you must manually write the code to perform data binding. 如果两个指定值属性和属性，则 ASP.NET 将无法解析数据源和一个引发异常。If values are specified for both the property and the property, ASP.NET is not able to resolve the data source and an exception is thrown. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

exception.span: 无法解析数据源，因为对 属性和 属性指定了同一个值。

span.span: The data source cannot be resolved because a value is specified for both the property and the property.

summary.span: 验证数据列表控件是否需要数据绑定，并验证在调用 方法前是否指定了有效的数据源控件。

span.span: Verifies that the data listing control requires data binding and that a valid data source control is specified before calling the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的值时属性，ASP.NET 会自动将数据绑定列表指定的数据源控件的控件。When you specify a value for the property, ASP.NET automatically binds the data listing control to the specified data source control. 当 ASP.NET 执行数据绑定控件时，它将调用方法首先验证控件具有尚未绑定到数据，以及有效的数据源控件实现是否接口指定为其属性。When ASP.NET performs data binding for the control, it calls the method first to verify that the control has not already been bound to data and that a valid data source control that implements the interface is specified for its property. 方法随后调用方法。The method then calls the method.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定是否显示数据列表控件的单元格之间的边框。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the border between the cells of a data listing control is displayed.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定是否显示数据列表控件的单元格之间的边框。Use the property to specify whether the border between the cells of a data listing control is displayed. 此属性设置其中一个枚举值。This property is set with one of the enumeration values. 下表列出了可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |“值”Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`None`|显示没有单元格边框。No cell border is displayed.| |`Horizontal`|显示仅在数据列表控件中单元格的上限和下限边框。Only the upper and lower borders of the cells in a data listing control are displayed.| |`Vertical`|仅左侧和右侧显示的边框的数据列表控件中的单元格。Only the left and right borders of the cells in the data list control are displayed.| |`Both`|显示数据列表控件中单元格所有边框。All borders of the cells in a data listing control are displayed.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性数据绑定控件中显示这两个水平和垂直网格线。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display both the horizontal and vertical gridlines in a data-bound control. [!code-aspx-csharp[BaseDataListGridLines#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListGridLines/CS/basedatalistgridlinescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BaseDataListGridLines#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListGridLines/VB/basedatalistgridlinesvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的数据列表控件在其容器内的水平对齐方式。Use the property to specify the horizontal alignment of a data listing control within its container. 此属性设置其中一个枚举值。This property is set with one of the enumeration values. 下表列出了可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |“值”Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`NotSet`|未设置水平对齐方式。The horizontal alignment is not set.| |`Left`|列表控件的数据为左对齐其容器中。The data listing control is left-aligned within its container.| |`Center`|数据列表控件在其容器内居中。The data listing control is centered within its container.| |`Right`|列表控件的数据是在其容器内右对齐。The data listing control is right-aligned within its container.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定的数据绑定控件的水平对齐方式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the horizontal alignment of the data-bound control. [!code-aspx-csharp[BaseDataListHorizontalAlign#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListHorizontalAlign/CS/basedatalisthorizontalaligncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BaseDataListHorizontalAlign#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListHorizontalAlign/VB/basedatalisthorizontalalignvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void OnDataBinding (EventArgs e);

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 控件的 事件。

span.span: Raises the event of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 绑定到数据时将引发事件控件。The event is raised when data is bound to the control. 此方法通知控件来执行与之相关联的任何数据绑定逻辑。This method notifies the control to perform any data-binding logic that is associated with it. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法来重新绑定到其数据的数据绑定控件时， ，或属性的值更改后的页事件。The method is called to rebind the data-bound control to its data when the , , or property changes values after the page's event.

span.span: The source of the event.
An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法会通知数据绑定控件，基础数据源已更改，并且该控件应重新绑定应执行任何必要的工作。The method notifies a data-bound control that the underlying data source has changed and that the control should rebind and any necessary work should be performed. 通常情况下，时数据源视图的属性已更改调用方法。Typically, the method is called when a property of the data source view has changed. 类集属性设置为`true`时引发事件。The class sets the property to `true` when the event is raised. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据列表控件的各次发送到服务器中选择不同的项时引发事件。The event is raised when a different item is selected in a data listing control between posts to the server. 方法，可创建自定义事件处理程序。The method allows you to create a custom handler for the event. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 继承自，则必须实现方法以准备用于数据绑定控件的控件层次结构。When you inherit from , you must implement the method to prepare the control hierarchy for the data-bound control.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示数据列表控件是否需要绑定到其指定的数据源。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the data listing control needs to bind to its specified data source.

value.span: 如果该控件需要绑定到数据源，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control needs to bind to a data source; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件使用属性来确定控件是否需要调用方法绑定到其指定的数据源。The control uses the property to determine whether the control needs to call the method to bind to its specified data source. 每次`set`访问器上调用，则，或属性更改后的数据源方法被调用时，ASP.NET 会自动设置的值属性设置为`true`。Each time the `set` accessor is called on either the , the , or the property to change the data source after the method has already been called, ASP.NET automatically sets the value of the property to `true`. 值属性也设置为`true`时调用方法。The value of the property is also set to `true` when the method is called. ASP.NET 会自动设置的值属性设置为`false`后立即调用方法。ASP.NET automatically sets the value of the property to `false` immediately after the method has been called.

span.span: Occurs when a different item is selected in a data listing control between posts to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据列表控件的各次发送到服务器中选择不同的项时引发事件。The event is raised when a different item is selected in a data listing control between posts to the server. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何提供的事件处理程序事件以声明方式。The following code example demonstrates how to provide an event handler for the event declaratively. [!code-aspx-csharp[BaseDataListSelectedIndexChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListSelectedIndexChanged/CS/basedatalistselectedindexchangedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BaseDataListSelectedIndexChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListSelectedIndexChanged/VB/basedatalistselectedindexchangedvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何提供的事件处理程序事件以编程方式。The following code example demonstrates how to provide an event handler for the event programmatically. [!code-aspx-csharp[BaseDataListSelectedIndexChanged2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListSelectedIndexChanged2/CS/basedatalistselectedindexchanged2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BaseDataListSelectedIndexChanged2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListSelectedIndexChanged2/VB/basedatalistselectedindexchanged2vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示在控件的 属性为 时，控件是否应将呈现的 HTML 元素的 特性设置为 "disabled"。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's property is .

value.span: 如果属性指示 ASP.NET 版本低于4.0; 否则为。

span.span: if the property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than 4.0; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示如何 ASP.NET 应呈现 HTML 控件的控件处于禁用状态时。This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. 如果此属性为`true`，ASP.NET 会将`disabled`属性时控件处于禁用状态。If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled. 如果此属性为`false`，ASP.NET 会将`class`属性时控件处于禁用状态。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示数据列表控件是否以可访问的格式呈现其标头。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the data listing control renders its header in an accessible format.

summary.span: 提供此属性的目的是使辅助技术设备的用户更易于访问控件。

span.span: This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices.

value.span: 如果控件以可访问的格式呈现其标头，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control renders its header in an accessible format; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定数据列表控件是否呈现其标头中可访问的格式。Use the property to specify whether the data listing control renders its header in an accessible format. 提供此属性的目的是使辅助技术设备的用户更易于访问控件。This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices. 默认情况下，此属性的值是`false`和控件的标头单元格标记之间呈现``和``。By default, the value of this property is `false` and the header for the control is rendered between cell tags `` and ``. 如果此属性的值是`true`，该控件的标头呈现表标头单元格标记之间``和``。If the value of this property is `true`, the header for the control is rendered between table header cell tags `` and ``. 此外，`scope="col"`属性添加到表头指定标头应用于列中的所有单元格。In addition, a `scope="col"` attribute is added to the table header to specify that the header applies to all the cells in the column. 默认呈现``保留元素水平方向将文本呈现为加粗并居中。The default rendering of the `` element is preserved, rendering text as bold and centered horizontally. 开发人员可以重写的行为``元素使用级联样式表 (CSS)。Developers can override the behavior of the `` element using a cascading style sheet (CSS). 但是，无需使用样式表时，不建议创建可访问网页。However, requiring the use of style sheets is discouraged when creating accessible Web pages. 对于数据列表控件，如控件和控件，继承自类，可以设置属性以声明方式或以编程方式。For data listing controls, such as the control and the control, that inherit from the class, you can set the property declaratively or programmatically. 如果您设置属性以编程方式，将其设置与数据绑定之前方法。If you set the property programmatically, set it before binding data with the method.
